response.original_title: Ghetto Brawls: Queen of the Hood
response.overview: ALL-NEW! Get prepared to witness the GHETTO s greatest compilation of **100% REAL** ULTRA-SEXY, VIOLENT & SHOCKING GIRL vs. GIRL STREET FIGHTS CAUGHT ON TAPE! THE ULTIMATE PARTY VIDEO! You ll be on the edge of your seat as you experience ALL of the jaw-dropping NON-STOP TOTALLY UNCENSORED shirt-ripping, hair-flying, weave-pulling, skirt-splitting, extreme @ss-whooping NO-HOLDS-BARRED female fighting INSANITY!!! These HOT & WILD STREET BABES truly HATE each other and get DOWN & DIRTY until somebody gets knocked the F OUT!!! Who will emerge victorious and be crowned the QUEEN OF THE HOOD ?!? NOW AVAILABLE for the FIRST-TIME EVER!!! Hosted by 2 LIVE CREW's infamous DJ Mister Mixx! THis Special Deluxe Collector's Edition includes incredible GIRL vs. GUY Bonus Fight that sends the loser straight to the emergency room!! You won't believe your eyes We guarantee it!!! WARNING: MATURE CONTENT!! Viewer Discretion Is STRONGLY Advised!!!
